title: Matthias Steiner wins an emotional gold at Beijing 2008 | Epic Olympic Moments
description:
📲 Subscribe to @olympics: http://oly.ch/Subscribe 

 Matthias Steiner  - Countdown to Rio 2016 - 31 Iconic Olympic Moments

After winning gold in the Men's +105kg Weightlifting competition at the Beijing 2008 Olympics, Matthias Steiner dedicated his win to his late wife.  

As we countdown to Rio 2016, we're taking a look back at 31 iconic moments from Olympic history.

View the full playlist here - http://bit.ly/1WFqO6y
